utils.helpers module¶

class utils.helpers.DDPCounter(start=0, inc=1)[source]¶

Bases: object

Useful singleton class for keeping track of layers

inc()[source]¶
utils.helpers.get_index(b, k, first=True)[source]¶

Return 3dim index for a flattened tensor built from kxk planes

Parameters

  • b (int) – 1D index

  • k (int) – kernel size

  • first (bool) – if True then output will be channel,row,column tuple otherwise output will be row,column,channel tuple

utils.helpers.submatrix_generator(x_in, stride, kernel, padding=0)[source]¶

Returns a function which creates the subtensor of x_in used to compute value of output at i,j index

Parameters

  • x_in (numpy.ndarray or torch.Tensor) – dimensions assumed reference: channel, row, column

  • stride (int) –

  • kernel (int) – dimension of a square plane of filter or pooling size.

  • padding (int) – padding is assumed equal on all four dimensions
